translations: 用栅栏围住；用栅栏防卫

sentences.sentence: All you need do is keep out of the stockade.
sentences.translation: 你唯一需要做的，是不要陷入那栅栏之中。

sentences.sentence: When I reached the stockade , the house lay in dark shadow .
sentences.translation: 我到寨子的时候，木屋笼罩在黑暗中。

sentences.sentence: We were clear out of the ship, but not yet ashore in our stockade.
sentences.translation: 我们是从大船上脱了身，但是我们还没到达岸上的寨子。
